sentences.sContent: Doctors also warn us of nicotine, tar, and many other toxic substances contained in cigarettes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Doctors also warn us of nicotine, tar, and many other toxic substances contained in cigarettes.
sentences.sCn: 医生也警告我们，香烟含有尼古丁、焦油以及许多其他有毒的物质。

sentences.sContent: Nicotinic acetylcholine receptors have many functions, and in the brain are the primary targets of nicotine.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nicotinic acetylcholine receptors have many functions, and in the brain are the primary targets of nicotine.
sentences.sCn: 尼古丁乙酰胆碱受体有许多作用，在大脑中，它是尼古丁的主要目标。

trans.tranOther: a substance in tobacco which makes it difficult for people to stop smoking
